name: Infinite Mazes
description:
Made for the Weekly Game Jam (Week 129 - Lost in Space).

A simple puzzle game where you have to get your flying saucer to the wormhole without running out of fuel. Oh, and don't bump into the asteroids.

Controls: Arrow keys to move.

The mazes are procedurally generated. So, they don't get harder but you can keep playing new mazes forever. 

Hope you enjoy!
